Name: Agent Focus: Lucy
Desc: Use it to obtain the Agent or unlock the Agent's Mindscapes.
Desc2:
Snapshots from Lucy's daily life and from in combat, recording important moments before and after she became an Agent.
These images also provide insights into her fighting style and favorite weapons, helping to better understand her strengths.

Photos taken by Grassy, Woody, and Bricky at an amenable angle that perfectly capture the height that Lucy wanted to create.
